column1: Baby Barnaby's////I can't say enough good stuff about this cutie patootie diner! There really aren't any vegan options but if you're vegetarian they have veggie sausage patties and some other options. Our server Â Scott
column2: was by far my favorite server
column4: had great suggestions and was nice. It's super cute in there and my omnivorous friends really enjoyed their meals. I liked mine
column5: too. Thanks so much for the laughs
